s","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"tokenListsId","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"token","type":"address"}],"name":"tokenValue","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_user","type":"address"}],"name":"withdrawCollateral","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Mbelfi Protocol","details":"This contract handles position management, token swapping, and collateral operations The Position contract represents a user's lending position in the Mbelfi protocol. It manages collateral assets, borrow assets, and provides functionality for: - Withdrawing collateral - Swapping tokens within the position - Repaying loans with selected tokens - Calculating token values and exchange rates Key features: - Reentrancy protection for secure operations - Dynamic token list management - Price oracle integration for accurate valuations - Restricted access control (only lending pool can call certain functions)","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"Liquidate(address)":{"params":{"user":"The address of the user whose position was liquidated"}},"SwapToken(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens being swapped","token":"The address of the token being swapped","user":"The address of the user performing the swap"}},"SwapTokenByPosition(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amountIn":"The amount of input tokens","amountOut":"The amount of output tokens received","tokenIn":"The address of the input token","tokenOut":"The address of the output token","user":"The address of the user initiating the swap"}},"WithdrawCollateral(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of collateral withdrawn","user":"The address of the user withdrawing collateral"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"details":"Sets up the initial position with collateral and borrow assets","params":{"_borrow":"The address of the borrow token","_collateral":"The address of the collateral token","_factory":"The address of the factory contract","_lpAddress":"The address of the lending pool"}},"repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address)":{"details":"Only the lending pool can call this functionIf the selected token is not the borrow asset, it will be swapped firstAny excess tokens after repayment are swapped back to the original token","params":{"_token":"The address of the token to use for repayment","amount":"The amount to repay"}},"swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Only the lending pool can call this functionUses Chainlink price feeds to calculate exchange ratesBurns input tokens and mints output tokens","params":{"_tokenIn":"The address of the input token","_tokenOut":"The address of the output token","amountIn":"The amount of input tokens to swap"},"returns":{"amountOut":"The amount of output tokens received"}},"tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256,address,address)":{"details":"Uses Chainlink price feeds to determine exchange ratesHandles different token decimals automatically","params":{"_amountIn":"The amount of input tokens","_tokenIn":"The address of the input token","_tokenInPrice":"The address of the input token's price feed","_tokenOut":"The address of the output token","_tokenOutPrice":"The address of the output token's price feed"},"returns":{"_0":"The calculated output amount"}},"tokenValue(address)":{"details":"Uses Chainlink price feeds to get current token pricesReturns value normalized to 18 decimals for consistency","params":{"token":"The address of the token to calculate value for"},"returns":{"_0":"The USD value of the token balance (in 18 decimals)"}},"withdrawCollateral(uint256,address)":{"details":"Only the lending pool can call this functionTransfers collateral tokens to the specified user","params":{"_user":"The address of the user to receive the collateral","amount":"The amount of collateral to withdraw"}}},"title":"Position","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"InsufficientBalance()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when there are insufficient tokens for an operation"}],"NotForWithdraw()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when a function is called by unauthorized address"}],"ZeroAmount()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when attempting to process a zero amount"}]},"events":{"Liquidate(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a position is liquidated"},"SwapToken(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are swapped within the position"},"SwapTokenByPosition(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are swapped by the position contract"},"WithdrawCollateral(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when collateral is withdrawn from the position"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"borrowAssets()":{"notice":"The borrow token address for this position"},"collateralAssets()":{"notice":"The collateral token address for this position"},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructor to initialize a new position"},"counter()":{"notice":"Counter for tracking unique token IDs in the position's token position"},"repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Repays a loan using a selected token"},"swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Swaps tokens within the position using token ID to token address"},"tokenListsId(address)":{"notice":"Mapping from token address to token ID"},"tokenValue(address)":{"notice":"Calculates the USD value of a token balance in the constructor.details: Sets up the initial position with collateral and borrow assets

params._borrow: The address of the borrow token
params._collateral: The address of the collateral token
params._factory: The address of the factory contract
params._lpAddress: The address of the lending pool

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address).details: Only the lending pool can call this functionIf the selected token is not the borrow asset, it will be swapped firstAny excess tokens after repayment are swapped back to the original token

params._token: The address of the token to use for repayment

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.details: Only the lending pool can call this functionUses Chainlink price feeds to calculate exchange ratesBurns input tokens and mints output tokens

params._tokenIn: The address of the input token
params._tokenOut: The address of the output token
params.amountIn: The amount of input tokens to swap

returns.amountOut: The amount of output tokens received

tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256,.details: Uses Chainlink price feeds to determine exchange ratesHandles different token decimals automatically

params._tokenIn: The address of the input token
params._tokenInPrice: The address of the input token's price feed
params._tokenOut: The address of the output token
params._tokenOutPrice: The address of the output token's price feed

tokenValue(address).details: Uses Chainlink price feeds to get current token pricesReturns value normalized to 18 decimals for consistency

params.token: The address of the token to calculate value for

returns._0: The USD value of the token balance (in 18 decimals)

withdrawCollateral(uint256,address).details: Only the lending pool can call this functionTransfers collateral tokens to the specified user

params._user: The address of the user to receive the collateral
params.amount: The amount of collateral to withdraw

borrowAssets().notice: The borrow token address for this position

collateralAssets().notice: The collateral token address for this position

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize a new position

counter().notice: Counter for tracking unique token IDs in the position's token list

lpAddress().notice: The lending pool address that manages this position

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address).notice: Repays a loan using a selected token

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.notice: Swaps tokens within the position using price oracles

tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256,.notice: Calculates the output amount for a token swap based on price feeds

tokenLists(uint256).notice: Mapping from token ID to token address

tokenListsId(address).notice: Mapping from token address to token ID

tokenValue(address).notice: Calculates the USD value of a token balance in the position
